title: Lighter Quiche Lorraine
ingredients: ['1 pinch freshly grated nutmeg', '1 teaspoon oil for greasing', '150g grated Gruyere cheese', '200g cooked or smoked ham, cut into small cubes', '300ml creme fraiche', '300ml semi-skimmed milk', '4 eggs, beaten', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 sheet shortcrust pastry']
